utter_faq/how_to_file_grievance.text: You can file a grievance either by a chatbot or a form.

utter_faq/grievance_types.text: You can report issues like service delays, misbehavior, corruption, lack of facilities, or any grievance against government departments.

utter_faq/resolution_time.text: Most grievances are resolved within 15 to 30 days depending on the department and issue severity.

utter_faq/track_status.text: You can track your grievance using the complaint ID or mobile number on the Goa grievance app.

utter_faq/not_resolved.text: If your grievance isnâ€™t resolved, you can escalate it to a higher authority or file a reminder through the app.

utter_faq/registration_required.text: Registration is recommended so you can track and follow up on your grievance.

utter_faq/helpline_contact.text: You can contact the grievance helpline at +91 832 2419550 for assistance with filing or tracking complaints.

utter_faq/departments_covered.text: Departments like PWD, Electricity, Health, Education, Panchayat, and more are covered under the Goa grievance redressal system.
